channel.title: Comments on: Links for Thu 31 Jan 2008

item.title: By: Alexandre Solleiro
item.dc:creator: Alexandre Solleiro
item.description:
Hello Joseph,
Thanks for the link.
I've updated the bot to add some features: in addition to posting tagged messages, you can now fetch posts using special commands.
Here's the release: http://webcracy.org/code/prologuer-bot-02/
Cheers,
Alexandre
item.content:encoded:
Hello Joseph,

Thanks for the link.

I’ve updated the bot to add some features: in addition to posting tagged messages, you can now fetch posts using special commands.

Here’s the release: http://webcracy.org/code/prologuer-bot-02/

Cheers,

Alexandre
